div.head: Description of changes for 2013.01
div.p: This is the first public version of this text. It is a first draft copied from a descriptive transcription of the St. Victor manuscript. A transcription of the Sorbonne ms. still needs to be completed. Corrections and additions will be made after a collation comparision of available manuscript witnesses. Troublesome transcriptions have been makred as 'unclear' and ref attributes have been added toall name elements. Citations, footnotes, and a critical apparatus still need tto be constructed.
